(max-width:767px){.C0058 .slick-dots li{width:10px;height:10px;margin-left:8px}}.C0058 .slick-dots li a,.C0058 .slick-dots li button{background:#fff;display:block;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0;padding:0;border:0;border-radius:50%}.C0058 .slick-dots li a:focus,.C0058 .slick-dots li button:focus{outline:1px dotted;outline:5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color}.C0058 .slick-dots li.slick-active{border:1px solid #a50034}.C0058 .slick-dots li.slick-active a,.C0058 .slick-dots li.slick-active button{background:#a50034}.C0058 .slick-dots li:only-child{display:none}.C0058 .slick-slider{position:relative;display:block;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;background:#fff;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;-webkit-touch-callout:none;-khtml-user-select:none;-ms-touch-action:pan-y;touch-action:pan-y;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}.C0058 .slick-slider .slick-list,.C0058 .slick-slider .slick-track{-webkit-transform:translate3d(0,0,0);-ms-transform:translate3d(0,0,0);transform:translate3d(0,0,0)}.C0058 .slick-list{position:relative;display:block;overflow:hidden;margin:0;padding:0}.C0058 .slick-list:focus{outline:0}.C0058 .slick-list.dragging{cursor:pointer;cursor:hand}.C0058 .slick-track{position:relative;top:0;left:0;display:block;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}.C0058 .slick-track:after,.C0058 .slick-track:before{display:table;content:''}.C0058 .slick-track:after{clear:both}.C0058 .slick-loading .slick-track{visibility:hidden}.C0058 .slick-slide{display:none;float:left;height:100%;min-height:1px}.C0058 .slick-slide img{display:block}.C0058 .slick-slide.slick-loading img{display:none}.C0058 .slick-slide.dragging img{pointer-events:none}.C0058 .slick-initialized .slick-slide{display:block}.C0058 .slick-loading .slick-slide{visibility:hidden}.C0058 .slick-vertical .slick-slide{display:block;height:auto;border:1px solid transparent}.C0058 .slick-arrow.slick-hidden{display:none}html[hcx="3"] .C0058 .img-area .text-white{background:#000}
